page.title: 12 WILDLIFE
page.content: I would recommend{Moreton, Eye and {Ashton}for{birdlife.}We have water birds in this area because there are lots of lakes and ponds. We have a wide variety of rare birds like {buzzards and herons.}There are of course also many common birds. The area is rich in wildlife because we are in a rural area.{Deer and {badgers}have been sighted in this area. There are also good places for fishing. Since the hedgerows and verges are not cut so frequently there is an abundance of{wild flowers.}Some of the{hedges}in our area are over 600 years old! This area is very peaceful and beautiful with its trees, fields and hills.
